articles.description: The Indian Premier League (IPL) will have an extended 10-week window in the next international calendar to allow all the world’s top cricketers to participate in the popular Twenty20 competition, a top Indian board official told news agency Reuters.

articles.title: Watch: Umran Malik defends 12 off last 4 balls in dramatic final over vs Ireland - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Speedster Umran Malik bowled the final over in the high-scoring game against Ireland, and it all came down to the wire as the result was decided on the final ball of the match.
